casebody.data:
Istrate IONESCU
v.
TOWN OF STRATFORD Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 20, 2017

Istrate Ionescu, self-represented, in support of the petition.

Sean R. Plumb, in opposition.

The plaintiffs petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 173 Conn.App. 906, 164 A.3d 905 (2017), is denied.
